Description: Stamp (vessel): mikyala. Measure of black cumin. Six line inscription. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: See also OA+ 4074. From the same die: Miles, G.C. 1958. ‘Contributions to Arabic metrology’ I. New York, 116.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (212)
